Sentence.sentence: Which makes it odd that the kitchen has become the heart of the modern house: what the great hall was to the medieval castle, the kitchen is to the 21stcentury home.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But very often, a writer can appear to stand aside, and this detachment makes people feel there's a bit of ice in the heart
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Several noted nutritionists and research projects have concluded that this diet is one of the most healthful in the world in terms of preventing such illnesses as heart disease and cancer, and increasing life expectancy.

Sentence.sentence: The Mediterranean groups had lower mortality rates in all age brackets and from all causes, particularly from heart disease.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"中心"之意。
means: center ： 指三维空间的中心点，也可比喻抽象事物的中心。
middle ： 一般指时间、空间或过程两端间等距的部分。
heart ： 指事物最内部或最重要的部分，表地理位置时可与center换用。
core ： 指某事物固定的中心部分或最重要的核心部分。比喻意义指某物的精华。
midst ： 书面语用词，指在一个群体的深处或在某活动的进程中。

word_mean: 心脏，心：心肌构成的器官，维持血液循环。又称cor 〔NA〕。心分四腔，两心房和两心室。左心房自肺接受氧合的血，由左心房进入左心室，泵入主动脉，经动脉分支供应全身，右心房接受被组织消耗了氧的血，进入右心室，然后将血泵入肺，使血再度氧合。心的主要瓣膜有四：左心房与左心室之间的二尖瓣
右心房与右心室之间的三尖瓣
位于主动脉口的主动脉瓣
位于肺动脉口的肺动脉瓣。冠状动脉供应心脏自身的血液和营养
心，五脏之一，位居胸腔之内，膈之上，有心包卫护于外，其主要生理功能是主血脉、主神志，并与舌和汗液密切相关。

Sentence.sentence: His voice was almost gone and his heart was heavy.

sentences.en: My heart aches.
sentences.cn: 我心痛。

means.word_mean: 内心, 心肠; 爱心

sentences.en: His heart is full of goodwill to all men.
sentences.cn: 他心里对所有人都充满着爱心。

means.word_mean: 感情, 爱好, 爱情

sentences.en: He wrote her and declared his heart.
sentences.cn: 他给她写了信, 表述自己的爱慕之情。

sentences.en: I didn't have the heart to tell him the news.
sentences.cn: 我没有勇气把这消息告诉他。

sentences.en: They had reached the heart of the forest.
sentences.cn: 他们到了森林的中心地带。

sentences.en: The heart of the problem is a shortage of funds.
sentences.cn: 问题的关键是缺乏经费。</seg>

data.mean: 心形物；（常指象征爱的）红心
help out; help sb↔out 帮助某人摆脱（困境）
lose heart 丧失信心；泄气

sentence.cn: 我们如何弥合将我们与其他动物区分开的不断扩大的鸿沟？克里斯和蒂姆为我们提供了答案：人类理所当然地认为大脑拥有所有的解决方案，但也许他们的内心可以成为更好的向导。
sentence.en: How can we bridge the ever-widening gap that separates us from other animals? Chris and Tim offered us the answer: human beings took it for granted that their brains held all the solutions, but maybe their hearts can be a better guide.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

mean.mean: help out; help sb↔out 帮助某人摆脱（困境）

jx.jx_en_mean: of the type that one likes or understands best; sharing one's tastes
jx.jx_cn_mean: 合自己心意，称自己的心；与自己有相同爱好

phrase.cizu_name: close (或 dear) to (或 near) one's heart

jx.jx_en_mean: of deep interest and concern to one

jx.jx_cn_mean: 发自内心的（地）；诚心诚意的（地）

lj.lj_ly: their warmth and hospitality is right from the heart.
lj.lj_ls: 他们的热情好客是发自内心的。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 有一颗仁厚的心，有一颗金子般的心

phrase.cizu_name: have the heart to do something

jx.jx_en_mean: [usu. with negative]be insensitive or hard-hearted enough to do something

lj.lj_ly: I don't have the heart to tell her.

jx.jx_en_mean: be (or become) keenly involved in or committed to (an enterprise)

phrase.cizu_name: have one's heart in one's mouth
have one's heart in the right place

jx.jx_en_mean: used in allusion to extreme sentimentality
used in reference to emotional and intellectual support or commitment

lj.lj_ly: a campaign to win the hearts and minds of America's college students.
lj.lj_ls: 争取美国大学生全心支持的运动。

entry.def: Your heart is the organ in your chest that pumps the blood around your body. People also use heart to refer to the area of their chest that is closest to their heart.

example.ex: The bullet had passed less than an inch from Andrea's heart...
example.tran: 子弹在离安德烈亚的心脏不到一英寸的地方穿过。

example.ex: The only sound inside was the beating of his heart...
example.tran: 屋内唯一的声音就是他的心跳声。

entry.def: You can refer to someone's heart when you are talking about their deep feelings and beliefs.

example.ex: Alik's words filled her heart with pride...
example.tran: 亚利克的话让她心感自豪。

example.ex: I just couldn't bring myself to admit what I knew in my heart to be true.
example.tran: 我就是无法迫使自己承认心里知道的事实。

entry.def: You use heart when you are talking about someone's character and attitude towards other people, especially when they are kind and generous.

example.ex: She loved his brilliance and his generous heart...
example.tran: 她深爱他的才华横溢和古道热肠。

example.ex: She's got a good heart but she's calculating.
example.tran: 她心地善良，但却工于心计。

entry.def: If you refer to things of the heart, you mean love and relationships.

example.ex: This is an excellent time for affairs of the heart.
example.tran: 这是谈情说爱的绝佳时机。

entry.def: The heart of something is the most central and important part of it.

example.ex: The heart of the problem is supply and demand...
example.tran: 问题的核心是供求关系。

example.ex: Money lies at the heart of the debate over airline safety.
example.tran: 资金是空运安全争论中的实质问题。

entry.def: The heart of a place is its centre.

example.ex: ...a busy dentists' practice in the heart of London's West End.
example.tran: 位于伦敦西区中心的一个繁忙的牙科诊所

entry.def: The heart of a lettuce, cabbage, or other vegetable is its centre leaves.
A heart is a shape that is used as a symbol of love: ♥.

example.ex: ...heart-shaped chocolates.
example.tran: 心形巧克力

entry.def: Hearts is one of the four suits in a pack of playing cards. Each card in the suit is marked with one or more red symbols in the shape of a heart.
If you feel or believe something with all your heart, you feel or believe it very strongly.
entry.tran: 全心全意地;真心实意地

example.ex: My own family I loved with all my heart.
example.tran: 我真心实意地爱我全家人。

entry.def: If you say that someone is a particular kind of person at heart, you mean that that is what they are really like, even though they may seem very different.

example.ex: He was a very gentle boy at heart.
example.tran: 他实际上是个非常温柔的男生。

entry.def: If you say that someone has your interests or your welfare at heart, you mean that they are concerned about you and that is why they are doing something.
entry.tran: 十分关心（某人的利益或福祉）

example.ex: She told him she only had his interests at heart.
example.tran: 她告诉他自己万事都是为了他好。

entry.def: If someone breaks your heart, they make you very sad and unhappy, usually because they end a love affair or close relationship with you.
entry.tran: （通常指因感情破裂而）使…伤心，使…心碎

entry.def: If something breaks your heart, it makes you feel very sad and depressed, especially because people are suffering but you can do nothing to help them.
entry.tran: （尤指因对他人的苦难无能为力而）使…伤心，使…心碎

example.ex: It really breaks my heart to see them this way.
example.tran: 看到他们这个样子可真让我伤心。

entry.def: If you say that someone has a broken heart, you mean that they are very sad, for example because a love affair has ended unhappily.

example.ex: She never recovered from her broken heart.
example.tran: 她心上的伤再也没能愈合。

entry.def: If you know something such as a poem by heart, you have learned it so well that you can remember it without having to read it.

example.ex: Mack knew this passage by heart.
example.tran: 麦克会背这一段。

entry.def: If someone has a change of heart, their attitude towards something changes.

example.ex: Several brokers have had a change of heart about prospects for the company...
example.tran: 几位经纪人对该公司前景的看法已经有所改变。

example.ex: Why the change of heart?
example.tran: 为什么变了态度？

entry.def: If something such as a subject or project is close to your heart or near to your heart, it is very important to you and you are very interested in it and concerned about it.

example.ex: Animal welfare is a subject very close to my heart.
example.tran: 动物福利是我非常关注的一个问题。

entry.def: If you can do something to your heart's content, you can do it as much as you want.

example.ex: I was delighted to be able to eat my favorite dishes to my heart's content.
example.tran: 我很高兴能够痛痛快快地吃我最喜爱的菜。

entry.def: You can say 'cross my heart' when you want someone to believe that you are telling the truth. You can also ask 'cross your heart?', when you are asking someone if they are really telling the truth.
entry.tran: 我发誓（所说的是真的）/你敢发誓（所说的是真的）吗？

example.ex: And I won't tell any of the other girls anything you tell me about it. I promise, cross my heart.
example.tran: 我不会把你告诉我的事告诉任何其他女孩。我发誓，保证不会。

entry.def: If you say something from the heart or from the bottom of your heart, you sincerely mean what you say.

example.ex: He spoke with confidence, from the heart...
example.tran: 他的话充满信心，发自心坎。

example.ex: I don't want to go away without thanking you from the bottom of my heart.
example.tran: 我离开之前一定要先衷心地感谢你。

entry.def: If something gives you heart, it makes you feel more confident or happy about something.

example.ex: It gave me heart to see one thug get what he deserves.
example.tran: 看到一个恶棍罪有应得真是大快我心。

entry.def: If you want to do something but do not have the heart to do it, you do not do it because you know it will make someone unhappy or disappointed.

example.ex: We knew all along but didn'thave the heart to tell her.
example.tran: 我们一直都知道，但却不忍心告诉她。

entry.def: If you believe or know something in your heart of hearts, that is what you really believe or think, even though it may sometimes seem that you do not.

example.ex: I know in my heart of hearts that I am the right man for that mission.
example.tran: 我心里深知我是完成那项任务的合适人选。

entry.def: If your heart isn't in the thing you are doing, you have very little enthusiasm for it, usually because you are depressed or are thinking about something else.

example.ex: I tried to learn some lines but my heart wasn't really in it.
example.tran: 我想要背几句台词，但我的心根本不在那上面。

entry.def: If you lose heart, you become sad and depressed and are no longer interested in something, especially because it is not progressing as you would like.

example.ex: He appealed to his countrymen not to lose heart.
example.tran: 他呼吁自己的同胞不要丧失信心。

entry.def: If you lose your heart to someone, you fall in love with them.
If your heart is in your mouth, you feel very excited, worried, or frightened.
entry.tran: 激动非常;焦急万分;害怕得要命

example.ex: My heart was in my mouth when I walked into her office.
example.tran: 我走进她的办公室时，紧张得心都到了喉咙口。

entry.def: If you open your heart or pour out your heart to someone, you tell them your most private thoughts and feelings.

example.ex: She opened her heart to millions yesterday and told how she came close to suicide.
example.tran: 她昨天在数成百万人面前倾吐心声，讲述了自己是如何差点轻生的。

entry.def: If you say that someone's heart is in the right place, you mean that they are kind, considerate, and generous, although you may disapprove of other aspects of their character.
entry.tran: （尽管有其他缺点但）心地善良，心眼儿好

example.ex: He is a bit of a tearaway but his heart is in the right place.
example.tran: 他是有点像个阿飞，但心眼儿不错。

entry.def: If you have set your heart on something, you want it very much or want to do it very much.
entry.tran: 一心想要得到;一心想要做

example.ex: He had always set his heart on a career in the fine arts.
example.tran: 他一直以来都一心想把美术作为自己的事业。

entry.def: If you wear your heart on your sleeve, you openly show your feelings or emotions rather than keeping them hidden.
If you put your heart and soul into something, you do it with a great deal of enthusiasm and energy.
entry.tran: 全心全意地;尽心尽力地

example.ex: He will always be successful when he puts his mind to something, because he puts his heart and soul into it.
example.tran: 当他专心想干某件事时，他总是能成功，因为他会全心全意地投入其中。

entry.def: If you take heart from something, you are encouraged and made to feel optimistic by it.
If you take something to heart, for example someone's behaviour, you are deeply affected and upset by it.
entry.tran: 对…耿耿于怀;为…感到不快

example.ex: If someone says something critical I take it to heart.
example.tran: 如果有人提出批评，我会十分介意。

means.word_mean: 1. the locus of feelings and intuitions;

sentences.sentence: "in your heart you know it is true"

means.word_mean: 2. the hollow muscular organ located behind the sternum and between the lungs; its rhythmic contractions pump blood through the body;

sentences.sentence: "he stood still, his heart thumping wildly"
"you haven't got the heart for baseball"

means.word_mean: 4. an area that is approximately central within some larger region;

sentences.sentence: "it is in the center of town"
"they ran forward into the heart of the struggle"
"they were in the eye of the storm"

means.word_mean: 5. the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience;

sentences.sentence: "the heart and soul of the Republican Party"

means.word_mean: 6. an inclination or tendency of a certain kind;
7. a plane figure with rounded sides curving inward at the top and intersecting at the bottom; conventionally used on playing cards and valentines;

sentences.sentence: "he drew a heart and called it a valentine"

means.word_mean: 8. a firm rather dry variety meat (usually beef or veal);

sentences.sentence: "a five-pound beef heart will serve six"
"he had trouble expressing the affection he felt"

means.word_mean: 10. a playing card in the major suit of hearts;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English heorte, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch hart and German Herz, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin cor, cord- and Greek kēr, kardia

means: 心
内心
心肠
爱情
核心
中心
菜心
心形

health education and research trial 健康教育和研究试验

sentences.cn: 我走进她的办公室时，紧张得心都到了喉咙口。
sentences.en: My heart was in my mouth when I walked into her office.

sentences.cn: 他呼吁自己的同胞不要丧失信心。
sentences.en: He appealed to his countrymen not to lose heart.

sentences.cn: 我想要背几句台词，但我的心根本不在那上面。
sentences.en: I tried to learn some lines but my heart wasn't really in it.

sentences.cn: 我心里深知我是完成那项任务的合适人选。
sentences.en: I know in my heart of hearts that I am the right man for that mission.

sentences.cn: 我们一直都知道，但却不忍心告诉她。
sentences.en: We knew all along but didn'thave the heart to tell her.

sentences.cn: 看到一个恶棍罪有应得真是大快我心。
sentences.en: It gave me heart to see one thug get what he deserves.

sentences.cn: 我离开之前一定要先衷心地感谢你。
sentences.en: I don't want to go away without thanking you from the bottom of my heart.

sentences.cn: 他的话充满信心，发自心坎。
sentences.en: He spoke with confidence, from the heart...

sentences.cn: 我不会把你告诉我的事告诉任何其他女孩。我发誓，保证不会。
sentences.en: And I won't tell any of the other girls anything you tell me about it. I promise, cross my heart.

sentences.cn: 我很高兴能够痛痛快快地吃我最喜爱的菜。
sentences.en: I was delighted to be able to eat my favorite dishes to my heart's content.

sentences.cn: 动物福利是我非常关注的一个问题。
sentences.en: Animal welfare is a subject very close to my heart.

sentences.cn: 为什么变了态度？
sentences.en: Why the change of heart?

sentences.cn: 几位经纪人对该公司前景的看法已经有所改变。
sentences.en: Several brokers have had a change of heart about prospects for the company...

sentences.cn: 麦克会背这一段。
sentences.en: Mack knew this passage by heart.

sentences.cn: 她心上的伤再也没能愈合。
sentences.en: She never recovered from her broken heart.

sentences.cn: 看到他们这个样子可真让我伤心。
sentences.en: It really breaks my heart to see them this way.

sentences.cn: 她告诉他自己万事都是为了他好。
sentences.en: She told him she only had his interests at heart.

sentences.cn: 他实际上是个非常温柔的男生。
sentences.en: He was a very gentle boy at heart.

sentences.cn: 我真心实意地爱我全家人。
sentences.en: My own family I loved with all my heart.

sentences.cn: 心形巧克力
sentences.en: ...heart-shaped chocolates.

sentences.cn: 位于伦敦西区中心的一个繁忙的牙科诊所
sentences.en: ...a busy dentists' practice in the heart of London's West End.

sentences.cn: 资金是空运安全争论中的实质问题。
sentences.en: Money lies at the heart of the debate over airline safety.

sentences.cn: 问题的核心是供求关系。
sentences.en: The heart of the problem is supply and demand...

sentences.cn: 这是谈情说爱的绝佳时机。
sentences.en: This is an excellent time for affairs of the heart.

sentences.cn: 她心地善良，但却工于心计。
sentences.en: She's got a good heart but she's calculating.

sentences.cn: 她深爱他的才华横溢和古道热肠。
sentences.en: She loved his brilliance and his generous heart...

sentences.cn: 我就是无法迫使自己承认心里知道的事实。
sentences.en: I just couldn't bring myself to admit what I knew in my heart to be true.

sentences.cn: 亚利克的话让她心感自豪。
sentences.en: Alik's words filled her heart with pride...

sentences.cn: 屋内唯一的声音就是他的心跳声。
sentences.en: The only sound inside was the beating of his heart...

sentences.cn: 子弹在离安德烈亚的心脏不到一英寸的地方穿过。
sentences.en: The bullet had passed less than an inch from Andrea's heart...

sentences.en: heart trouble/failure

sentences.cn: 他们认为在遏制英国人对不健康食物成癔以及帮助遏止肥胖、糖尿病以及心脏病发病率急剧上升方面，政府行为是必要的。
sentences.en: They argue that government action is necessary to curb Britain’s addiction to unhealthy food and help halt spiraling rates of obesity, diabetes and heart disease.

sentences.cn: 如果我们成年人能够放任自己去做一些傻亊并傻笑一会儿，我们就能减少体内的压力激素，增加类似内啡 肽的健康激素，改善心脏血液流动，甚至还可以提髙抵抗感染的机率
sentences.en: If we adults could indulge in a bit of silliness and giggling, we would reduce the stress hormones in our bodies, increase good hormones like endorphin, improve blood flow to our hearts and ever have a greater chance of fighting off infection.

sentences.cn: outcomes.工作压力增加了心脏病和糖尿病的患病风险，加速衰老，减损寿命，也是导致抑郁症、焦虑症和诸多其他不良后果的原因之一。
sentences.en: Occupational stress increases the risk of heart attack and diabetes, accelerates the  aging  process,  decreases  longevity,  and  contributes  to depression  and  anxiety,  among  numerous  other  negative  health
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 在西非，人们长期咀嚼可乐果作为兴奋剂，因为它们含有咖啡因，咖啡因也天然存在于茶叶、咖啡和巧克力中。可乐果中也有心脏兴奋剂。
sentences.en: In West Africa, people have long chewed kola nuts as stimulants, because they contain caffeine that also occurs naturally in tea, coffee, and chocolate. They also have heart stimulants.
sentences.from: 17年12月六级真题(第一套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 在2000年，百岁老人的五大主要死亡原 因是心脏病、中风、流感、癌症和阿尔茨海默病。
sentences.en: In  2000,  the top  five  causes  of  death  for  centenarians were  heart  disease,  stroke,  flu,  cancer and  Alzheimer’s  Disease.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 据 ConAgra 的 主席 Charles Harper 所说，设计“健康之选”冷冻餐食产品线的想法源于他本人的一次心脏病发作。

sentences.cn: 当然，如果它对肥胖问题有影响，也将对糖尿病、心脏病和高血压产生影响。
sentences.en: And  of  course, if  it  has  an  impact  on  obesity,  it will  have  an  impact  on  diabetes, and  heart  disease,  and  high  blood pressure.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 睡眠少的人往往血压更高，往往会有心脏病、糖尿病、体重增加及其他问题。
sentences.en: People who sleep less tend  to  have  higher  blood  pressure,  heart attack, diabetes, weight gain and other problems.

sentences.en: “I guess she overheard her grandfather and me talking about how we're worried about how we're going to get to Houston, for my grandsons heart surgery，” said Allred

sentences.en: The human heart comprises three distinct cell types: cardiomyocytes, endothelial cells, and vascular smooth muscle cells.

sentences.cn: 该病人接受了心脏移植.
sentences.en: The patient had received a heart transplant.

sentences.cn: 人类第一次能源领域有良好的记录是心脏的领域.
sentences.en: The first human energy field to be well documented was the field of the heart.

sentences.cn: 爬楼梯对于心脏功能不强的人来说是一个沉重的负担.
sentences.en: Climbing stairs is a tax on a weak heart.

sentences.cn: 他说心脏协会应该把急救人工呼吸的内容从指导方法中去除掉.
sentences.en: He said the heart association should remove rescue breaths from the guidelines.

sentences.cn: 广告上的: 天地磁, 真的能治疗心脏病?
sentences.en: On advertisement: The day is geomagnetic, can you treat heart disease really?

sentences.cn: 而肥胖的狗同样也分享到了肥胖引发的类似的人类疾病, 其中包括心脏病.
sentences.en: And the portly pooches also risk similar illnesses, including heart disease.

sentences.cn: 脉搏: 心脏收缩造成的动脉中的压力波动.
sentences.en: Pulse: Pressure wave in the arteries from contraction of the heart.

sentences.cn: 上面动画讲述了随着每次心脏的收缩和扩张,血液是如何流过心脏的.
sentences.en: The animation shows how blood flows through the heart as it contracts and relates.

sentences.cn: 如果患者出现心脏病发作,也可能需要借助冠状动脉造影来帮助急救.
sentences.en: You also may need coronary angiography on an emergency basis if you're having a heart attack.

sentences.cn: 不久前,她第一次心脏病发作.
sentences.en: She had her first heart attack the other day.

sentences.cn: 病患的心脏动脉阻塞,导致严重中风.
sentences.en: Ex. This patient a serious heart attack caused a blocked artery.

sentences.cn: 蚯蚓没有肺, 通过皮肤呼吸,有的蚯蚓有多达10颗心脏.
sentences.en: The earthworm has no lungs; itbreathes through its skin. Some earthworms have asas ten hearts.

sentences.cn: 长时间的爬山使她的心脏悸动.
sentences.en: The long climb up the hill made her heart throb.

sentences.cn: 世界心脏联盟还说肥胖可能是导致保健费用急剧上涨的罪魁祸首.
sentences.en: The World Heart Federation says obesity can also be blamed for spiralling health costs.

sentences.cn: 这部小说准确地传达了一代人的感情和思想。
sentences.en: The story captured the hearts and minds of a generation.

sentences.cn: 我内心的感情是保守的,倾向于中世纪的.
sentences.en: My sentiments at heart were insular and medieval.

sentences.cn: 当你的心放在袖子上,你就是在表露你内心深处的感情.
sentences.en: And When your heart your slife, sleeve you are showing your deepest emotions.

sentences.cn: 等到黎明到来, 或许就已经解决了感情的问题.
sentences.en: And by morning's light, you just might solve the problems of the heart.

sentences.cn: 心被触动, 锁已生锈. 感情回归. 一切的一切因为有你.
sentences.en: Heart was touched, locks have been rusty. Feelings return. All because of you all.

sentences.cn: 我对中国有特殊的感情, 我的心情与那里的每个人都一样.
sentences.en: I know China is a very special place, and my heart goes out to everyone there.

sentences.cn: 难道那种崇高感情的残魂还逗留在他心田的某一角 吗 ?
sentences.en: Did the ghost of that grand passion linger in some corner of his heart?

sentences.cn: 矛盾的感情使她心胸极为烦闷.
sentences.en: Her heart is torn by conflicting emotions.

sentences.cn: 那么,既然他可能已经死了,你就要抱着这种感情终生不渝了?
sentences.en: And now that he's probably dead you are cherishing it to your heart.

sentences.cn: 如今女孩子不轻易流露自己的感情.
sentences.en: Girls nowadays don't wear their heart on their sleeves.

sentences.cn: 即使我不能包容这段感情.
sentences.en: And in my heart I can't contain it.

sentences.cn: 他感情用事而不理智.
sentences.en: He takes counsel of his heart, but not of his head.

sentences.cn: 我的感情是虎, 永远守卫着我的心房,守护着你不可取代的位置.
sentences.en: My heart is a tiger, forever guarding my heart against others that would take your place.

sentences.cn: 思嘉莉特将手放在马笼头上, 心里怀着一种郁闷的感情.
sentences.en: Scarlett stood with her hand on the horse's bridle, a dull feeling at her heart.

sentences.cn: 做生意凭感情用事是错误的.
sentences.en: In business, it is a mistake to allow the heart to rule the head.

sentences.cn: 简言之, 这种战争着眼于人们的感情,争的是民心,而不是土地.
sentences.en: In brief, this war aimed at people's emotions and sought to conquer hearts and not territory.

sentences.cn: 你也觉得感情会左右我的想法 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do you think that emotional uncertainty lies at t heart of all this?

sentences.cn: 别让感情支配理智.
sentences.en: Try not to let your heart rule your head.

sentences.cn: 但是我知道我父亲会公共表露他的感情.
sentences.en: But I know that my father wears his heart on his sleeve.

sentences.cn: 格拉泽一家的心像华尔街般冷漠而不是像曼彻斯特人一样感情丰富.
sentences.en: These are men whose hearts are aligned to Wall Street stoniness rather than Mancunian sentimentality.

sentences.cn: 她感情善变, 就是喜欢不同的男生.
sentences.en: She is very fickle with her heart, always falling for different boys.

sentences.cn: 她感情超越了理智(以感情而不以理智支配行动).
sentences.en: She let her heart rule her head , ie acted according to her emotions, rather than sensibly.

sentences.cn: 感情造就革命, 理智形成改革.
sentences.en: The heart makes a revolution, the head a reformation.

sentences.cn: 我对我的母校特别有感情.
sentences.en: I have a soft spot in my heart for my old school.

sentences.cn: 我不是个让感情控制理智的人.
sentences.en: I was not one to let my heart ruled by head.

sentences.cn: 她心中产生了伶悯的感情.
sentences.en: Pity stirred in her heart.

sentences.cn: 心甾感情中轮回就卜再高贵.
sentences.en: Heart in sentiment samsara no longer noble.

sentences.cn: 汉斯带着强烈的感情读这首抒情诗.
sentences.en: Hans was reading the lyric poem with heart and soul.

sentences.cn: 他不是一个感情外露的人.
sentences.en: He is not a man who wears his heart on his sleeve.

sentences.cn: 华侨离乡背井,远居国外.因此他们在感情上越来越向往祖国大陆.
sentences.en: Absence and distance make the overseas Chinese heart increasingly fond of the motherland.

sentences.cn: 很多患者的心脏病发作初期仅仅表现为胸部的轻微疼痛或不适.

sentences.cn: Eyad的父亲心脏中枪,他的妈妈胸部中枪.
sentences.en: Eyad's father was shot in the heart and his mother in the chest.

sentences.cn: 我要听听你的胸部和心脏.
sentences.en: I want to listen to your chest and heart.

sentences.cn: 胸部. 肺部听诊有哮鸣音和湿罗音提示哮喘或心衰.
sentences.en: C . Chest. Auscultation of the lungs for wheezes and crackles may indicate asthma or heart failure.

sentences.cn: 当心脏供血不足时出现的一种胸部疼痛或者不适.
sentences.en: Angina is chest pain or discomfort that occurs when the heart does not get enough blood.

sentences.cn: 胸部:人体靠近心脏部位的区域; 胸部.
sentences.en: The area that is the approximate location of the heart in the body; the breast.

sentences.cn: 心脏病发作最为典型的症状就是胸部疼痛或不适.
sentences.en: The most common symptom of heart attack is chest pain or discomfort.

sentences.cn: 剧烈的胸部或背部疼痛可能使心脏问题.
sentences.en: Severe chest or back pain could signal a heart attack.

sentences.cn: 他把她的一只手按在自己胸部心脏的地方.
sentences.en: He pressed her hand against his heart.

sentences.cn: 你的胸部会放置小垫片以检查你的心率.男性可能要剃胸毛.
sentences.en: Small pads are put on your chest to check your heart rate.

sentences.cn: 最后对于师长们的叮咛、鼓励与教诲, 我们一定铭记在心牢牢记得.
sentences.en: Finally, we will remember teachers'teaching, encouragements and urges deeply in our hearts.

sentences.cn: 我们这一生, 母亲是一个充满鼓励的名字, 一对倾听同情的耳朵, 一颗充满温暖的心.
sentences.en: Throughout our lives, mothers are there an encouraging word, a sympathetic ear, and a tender heart.

sentences.cn: 战士们在领导的鼓励下继续作战而取得胜利.
sentences.en: The soldiers took heart from their leader's words and went on to win the battle.

sentences.cn: 对于那些帮助和鼓励过我的人,我总是心存感激.
sentences.en: To the person who helped me or encouraged me I always have an gratitude heart.

sentences.cn: 即使义务工作者不得不考虑自己的问题, 但他们做事仍受着良知的激励.
sentences.en: Even if they have to consider their own problems, volunteers are still prompted by their hearts.

sentences.cn: 我们应从这些激励性的故事中振作起来.
sentences.en: We should take heart from the encouraging stories.
